response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the pie out of the fridge. The robot now has the pie in its inventory. The next step in the original subtasks is to close the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the pie out of the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the oven.
(6) Open the oven.
(7) Put the pie in the oven.
(8) Close the oven.
(9) Turn on the oven to heat the pie.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Close the fridge
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_dszchb_0")
    close(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
